entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hot Reload fails to apply change with IndexOutOfRangeException #73416
  • Public API for partial properties #73411
  • Signature help does not appear for target typed new with partial parameter #73398
  • Trying to jump out of local function after a using declaration causes internal error: 'given key was not present in dictionary' #73397

Closed

  • SyntaxTokenParser API Additions #73002
  • VB.NET compiler erroneously reports error BC30439 when converting certain large Double values to Long #73032
    17.11
  • Collection expression overload resolution should chose type with valid .Add method #73403
  • error MSB6006: "csc.dll" exited with code 139 on almost empty project #73401
  • VB Span Perf Issue #73387
  • Overload resolution ambiguity introduced by SDK 8.0.300-preview.24203.14 #73346
    17.11

PullRequests

Created

  • Update local deployment instructions #73417
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2448523 #73415
    auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #73413
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • [main] Update dependencies to ensure coherency #73408
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Emit and roundtrip underlying instance field #73407
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Test local functions with goto out of scope #73402
    Area-Compilers, Test-Gap, untriaged

Merged

  • Enable hosts to provide custom assembly resolution #73185
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Improve C# grammar generator. #73340
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #73414
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Cherry pick fix for expanded message to 17.10 #73405
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix http 401 in signed build pipeline #73406
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge touch document actions #73399
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #73404
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix Double-to-Long overflow check #73016
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Specially handle more scenarios for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73363
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Fix sorting of extensions from more specific to less #73276
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • EnC: workaround for empty display class #73366
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Fix overload resolution regression around params parameters #73373
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections, Next
  • Update features to fork solution once instead of forking once per changed document. #73396
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use null for diagnostic ExpandedMessage so the client falls back appropriately #73395
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Ignore drive casing when comparing on windows platforms #73380
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Exclude assemblies shared by .NET ServiceHub host #73087
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Partial properties: basic indexer scenarios and signature mismatch diagnostics #73378
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add dynamic registration for razor and cshtml files #73369
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove IsCompatBreakingFeatureEnabled method #73371
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Use semantics to check for readonly struct #72893
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Continue visiting bad named argument if not target-typed in NullableWalker #73326
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
